message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we both lose money as time goes on.
Alice, your initial offer was quite low considering the rapid devaluation. Let's be fair to both of us. I propose a 60/40 split.
Bob, it seems we both value our time. This offer is a compromise, acknowledging the decreasing value while still being advantageous for both of us.
